explanation: [0-0] A person holds a blue iPhone in their left hand, while another person beside them carries a pink travel bag and a suitcase. White subtitles appear at the top of the screen, reading "iPhone Travel Hack".

[0-6] The scene then switches to the inside of an airplane, where a right hand places the phone against the airplane window. The left hand pulls down the window shade. The subtitles "Put your phone on time lapse" appear at the top of the screen. Then, the phone is placed between the window and the sunshade, and the subtitles change to "watch the magic happen". The plane then begins to taxi on the runway, preparing for takeoff. As the plane flies over a body of water, distant islands can be seen through the window.
